metadata.title: RZ/T2H, RZ/N2H: Documentation and sample software

sections.content:
Question:
As there appears to be a lot of RZ/T2H or RZ/N2H documentation and sample software, I'm not sure where to begin.
Answer:
Refer to the RZ/T2H Easy Download Guide or RZ/N2H Easy Download Guide.
Suitable Products
RZ/T2H, RZ/N2H
